group_1.textCenter: I know I've said this loads of times,
but you don't need to worry about me being a@Magical Girl, okay?
'Cause I seriously don't regret it one single bit.
For this cutie, living in a world without you would've@been seriously hell.
Like, worse than becoming a Witch, even.
But, even though I made a place for you to belong@inside of myself...
We still didn't get to have the freedom of love...

group_1.narration: "With Hiko-kun in my head, we got a place where@we can spend time alone, just the two of us.@But nobody believes that kinda stuff, and everyone@around me treats me like I'm some nutjob..."
"It started straight from when Hiko-kun was still alive,@people around us not lettin' us love freely..."

group_1.textCenter: Eventually I was thinking like, if all else fails,
I might as well just die.

group_1.narration: But then after meeting Sasha, this cutie@learned 'bout the Neo-Magius's Magical Girl supremacy,@the best and most seriously crazy way of thinking.
I have hope that if I go to the top, I'll get to have@a world where I can love freely.
At first I clashed a bit with@Shigurin and Hagurin...
'Cause though I was gonna realize@Magical Girl supremacy by joining the Neo-Magius@and pulling everyone to the top,
I honestly didn't think about@Shigurin and Hagurin's feelings, after I@took their spot as the leader...
But all three of us wanted the same thing,@to prove ourselves superior to others around us.@So through working together in Takarazaki,@we came to understand each other@and became buddies for real.
The Instructor and Miyurin also@understood our feelings.
They promised us we'd reach the top together,@even if it was twisted and immature.

group_1.textCenter: I thought I only had Hiko-kun,
but then I realized how totally precious everybody@is to cute lil' me now.
Like, I want them all to stay by my side, forever@and ever.
But...

group_1.narration: sorry princess, we cant go today after all...
please don't worry about us, and just have fun@hanging out with everyone else ^_^

group_1.textRight: I mean, Sasha, it was you and Her Highness who@promised to hang out at your place.
Surely it wouldn't matter even if not all of us can@make it?

group_1.textLeft: In that case, wouldn't it be okay even if Miyu@and the rest weren't there...?

group_1.textCenter: Well... Actually, I forgot to tell you yesterday, but...
I'm moving out.
Urmm... I seriously don't wanna believe this.
I mean, about everyone tryin' to get away from@cute lil' me...
But if it's for real, I'll never recover...
...Yeah, you're right. This isn't like this cutie.
I'm gonna contact everyone one more time!
Even if they are trying to get away from me,
maybe I've got a shot at keeping them around!
I know it's super uncool...@But I can't just let it end like this!
